mapper.select:
select a.pv pv, a.uv uv, b.orderAmount orderAmount, b.orderUser orderUser, b.orderCnt orderCnt, b.productCnt productCnt from ( select count(distinct_id) pv, uniq(distinct_id) uv, org_id from evente.em_events_dis where org_id = ${orgId} and toDate(time) between '${startDate}' and '${endDate}'
and event = 'ViewProduct' and product_id = ${productId} and product_type = '${productType}'
and event = 'PageView'
group by org_id ) a left join ( select sum(product_sub_price + freight_money) orderAmount, uniq(distinct_id) orderUser, uniq(increment_id) orderCnt, sum(product_number) productCnt, org_id from evente.em_events_dis where event = 'PaidOrder' and org_id = ${orgId} and toDate(time) between '${startDate}' and '${endDate}'
and product_id = ${productId} and product_type = '${productType}'
group by org_id ) b on a.org_id = b.org_id

select a.date date, a.pv pv, a.uv uv, b.orderAmount orderAmount, b.orderUser orderUser, b.orderCnt orderCnt, b.productCnt productCnt from ( select
concat(formatDateTime(time,'%F %I'),':00:00') date,
formatDateTime(time, '%F') date,
count(distinct_id) pv, uniq(distinct_id) uv from evente.em_events_dis where org_id = ${orgId} and toDate(time) between '${startDate}' and '${endDate}'
and event = 'ViewProduct' and product_id = ${productId} and product_type = '${productType}'
and event = 'PageView'
group by date ) a left join (select
concat(formatDateTime(time,'%F %I'),':00:00') date,
formatDateTime(time, '%F') date,
sum(product_sub_price + freight_money) orderAmount, uniq(distinct_id) orderUser, uniq(increment_id) orderCnt, sum(product_number) productCnt from evente.em_events_dis where event = 'PaidOrder' and org_id = ${orgId} and toDate(time) between '${startDate}' and '${endDate}'
and product_id = ${productId} and product_type = '${productType}'
group by date ) b on a.date = b.date order by date desc

select a.channel_id channel_id, a.uv uv, a.pv pv, ifNull(b.orderAmount, 0) orderAmount, ifNull(b.orderUser, 0)/ a.uv conversionRate, ifNull(b.orderCnt, 0) orderCnt, ifNull(b.productCnt, 0) productCnt from (select channel_id,count(distinct_id) pv, uniq(distinct_id) uv from evente.em_events_dis where org_id = ${orgId} and toDate(time) between '${startDate}' and '${endDate}'
and event = 'ViewProduct' and product_id = ${productId} and product_type = '${productType}'
and event = 'PageView'
group by channel_id) a left join ( select channel_id,sum(product_sub_price + freight_money) orderAmount, uniq(distinct_id) orderUser, uniq(increment_id) orderCnt, sum(product_number) productCnt from evente.em_events_dis where event = 'PaidOrder' and org_id = ${orgId} and toDate(time) between '${startDate}' and '${endDate}'
and product_id = ${productId} and product_type = '${productType}'
group by channel_id ) b on a.channel_id = b.channel_id ORDER BY orderAmount DESC
limit 5

select a.device_type client_id, a.uv uv, a.pv pv, ifNull(b.orderAmount, 0) orderAmount, ifNull(b.orderUser, 0)/ a.uv conversionRate, ifNull(b.orderCnt, 0) orderCnt, ifNull(b.productCnt, 0) productCnt from (select device_type,count(distinct_id) pv, uniq(distinct_id) uv from evente.em_events_dis where org_id = ${orgId} and toDate(time) between '${startDate}' and '${endDate}'
and event = 'ViewProduct' and product_id = ${productId} and product_type = '${productType}'
and event = 'PageView'
group by device_type) a left join ( select device_type,sum(product_sub_price + freight_money) orderAmount, uniq(distinct_id) orderUser, uniq(increment_id) orderCnt, sum(product_number) productCnt from evente.em_events_dis where event = 'PaidOrder' and org_id = ${orgId} and toDate(time) between '${startDate}' and '${endDate}'
and product_id = ${productId} and product_type = '${productType}'
group by device_type ) b on a.device_type = b.device_type ORDER BY orderAmount DESC
limit 5

select a.pay_way pay_way, b.orderAmount orderAmount, ifNull(b.orderUser,0)/a.orderUser conversionRate, b.orderCnt orderCnt, b.productCnt productCnt from ( select pay_way, uniq(distinct_id) orderUser from evente.em_events_dis where event = 'PayOrder' and org_id = ${orgId} and toDate(time) between '${startDate}' and '${endDate}'
and product_id = ${productId} and product_type = '${productType}'
group by pay_way) a left join ( select pay_way, sum(product_sub_price + freight_money) orderAmount, uniq(distinct_id) orderUser, uniq(increment_id) orderCnt, sum(product_number) productCnt from evente.em_events_dis where event = 'PaidOrder' and org_id = ${orgId} and toDate(time) between '${startDate}' and '${endDate}'
and product_id = ${productId} and product_type = '${productType}'
group by pay_way ) b on a.pay_way = b.pay_way order by orderAmount desc
limit 5

select a.region regionId, a.uv uv, a.pv pv, ifNull(b.orderAmount, 0) orderAmount, ifNull(b.orderUser, 0)/ a.uv conversionRate, ifNull(b.orderCnt, 0) orderCnt, ifNull(b.productCnt, 0) productCnt from (select count(distinct_id) pv, uniq(distinct_id) uv,
_province region
_city region
from evente.em_events_dis where org_id = ${orgId} and toDate(time) between '${startDate}' and '${endDate}'
and event = 'ViewProduct' and product_id = ${productId} and product_type = '${productType}'
and event = 'PageView'
group by region) a left join ( select sum(product_sub_price + freight_money) orderAmount, uniq(distinct_id) orderUser, uniq(increment_id) orderCnt, sum(product_number) productCnt,
_province region
_city region
from evente.em_events_dis where event = 'PaidOrder' and org_id = ${orgId} and toDate(time) between '${startDate}' and '${endDate}'
and product_id = ${productId} and product_type = '${productType}'
group by region ) b on a.region = b.region

select.if:
select viewDetailCnt, confirmOrderCnt, payOrderCnt, successPaylCnt, confirmOrderCnt / if(viewDetailCnt = 0, 1, viewDetailCnt) confirmOrderRate, payOrderCnt / if(confirmOrderCnt = 0, 1, confirmOrderCnt) payOrderRate, successPaylCnt / if(payOrderCnt = 0, 1, payOrderCnt) successOrderRate, successPaylCnt / if(viewDetailCnt = 0, 1, viewDetailCnt) totalRate from ( select max(if(event = 'ViewProduct', cnt, 0)) viewDetailCnt, max(if(event = 'MakeOrder', cnt, 0)) confirmOrderCnt, max(if(event = 'PayOrder', cnt, 0)) payOrderCnt, max(if(event = 'PaidOrder', cnt, 0)) successPaylCnt from ( select uniq(distinct_id) cnt, event from evente.em_events_dis where event in ('ViewProduct', 'MakeOrder', 'PayOrder', 'PaidOrder') and org_id = ${orgId} and toDate(time) between '${startDate}' and '${endDate}'
and product_id = ${productId} and product_type = '${productType}'
and device_type = ${agentType} group by event ))

select date, viewDetailCnt, confirmOrderCnt, payOrderCnt, successPaylCnt, confirmOrderCnt / if(viewDetailCnt = 0, 1, viewDetailCnt) confirmOrderRate, payOrderCnt / if(confirmOrderCnt = 0, 1, confirmOrderCnt) payOrderRate, successPaylCnt / if(payOrderCnt = 0, 1, payOrderCnt) successOrderRate, successPaylCnt / if(viewDetailCnt = 0, 1, viewDetailCnt) totalRate from ( select max(if(event = 'ViewProduct', cnt, 0)) viewDetailCnt, max(if(event = 'MakeOrder', cnt, 0)) confirmOrderCnt, max(if(event = 'PayOrder', cnt, 0)) payOrderCnt, max(if(event = 'PaidOrder', cnt, 0)) successPaylCnt, date from ( select uniq(distinct_id) cnt, event, toDate(time) date from evente.em_events_dis where event in ('ViewProduct', 'MakeOrder', 'PayOrder', 'PaidOrder') and org_id = ${orgId} and toDate(time) between '${startDate}' and '${endDate}'
and product_id = ${productId} and product_type = '${productType}'
and device_type = ${agentType} group by event,date ) group by date)

mapper.select: SELECT a.org_id orgId, a.product_type productType, a.agent_id agentId,a._province id, a.uv uv, a.pv pv, b.orderAmount orderAmount, b.productCnt productCnt, b.orderCnt orderCnt, b.orderUser successUser, b.orderUser / a.uv conversionRate FROM ( SELECT uniq(distinct_id) uv, count(distinct_id) pv, org_id, _province, product_type, agent_id FROM evente.em_events_dis WHERE org_id = ${orgId} and toDate(time) between '${startDate}' and '${endDate}' and event = 'ViewProduct' and agent_id = ${agentId} and product_type = ${productType} GROUP BY org_id, _province, product_type, agent_id) a LEFT JOIN ( select sum(product_sub_price + freight_money) orderAmount, sum(product_number) productCnt, uniq(increment_id) orderCnt, uniq(distinct_id) orderUser, org_id, _province, product_type, agent_id from evente.em_events_dis where event = 'PaidOrder' and org_id = ${orgId} and toDate(time) between '${startDate}' and '${endDate}' and agent_id = ${agentId} and product_type = ${productType} GROUP BY org_id, _province, product_type, agent_id) b on a._province = b._province

select a.org_id orgId, a.product_type productType, a.agent_id agentId, a.date statTime, a.uv uv, a.pv pv, b.orderAmount orderAmount, b.orderCnt orderCnt, b.userCnt successUser, b.userCnt/a.uv conversionRate, b.productNum productCnt, b.product_id productId from ( select
concat(formatDateTime(time,'%F %I'),':00:00') date,
formatDateTime(time, '%F') date,
org_id, agent_id, product_type, product_id, uniq(distinct_id) uv, count(distinct_id) pv from evente.em_events_dis where org_id = ${orgId} and toDate(time) between '${startDate}' and '${endDate}' and event = 'ViewProduct' and agent_id = ${agentId} and product_type = ${productType} group by date, org_id, agent_id, product_type, product_id) a left join ( select
concat(formatDateTime(time,'%F %I'),':00:00') date,
formatDateTime(time, '%F') date,
org_id, agent_id, product_type, product_id, uniq(increment_id) orderCnt, sum(product_sub_price + freight_money) orderAmount, sum(product_number) productNum, uniq(distinct_id) userCnt from evente.em_events_dis where org_id = ${orgId} and toDate(time) between '${startDate}' and '${endDate}' and event = 'PaidOrder' and agent_id = ${agentId} and product_type = ${productType} group by date, org_id, agent_id, product_type, product_id) b on a.date = b.date and a.org_id = b.org_id and a.agent_id = b.agent_id and a.product_id = b.product_id and a.product_type = b.product_type

select a.date statTime, a.org_id orgId, a.channel_id Id, a.agent_id agentId, a.product_type productType, a.product_id productId, a.uv uv, a.pv pv, b.orderCnt orderCnt, b.orderAmount orderAmount, b.userCnt successUser, b.userCnt/a.uv conversionRate, b.productNum productCnt from ( select
concat(formatDateTime(time,'%F %I'),':00:00') date,
formatDateTime(time, '%F') date,
org_id, agent_id, product_type, product_id, channel_id, uniq(distinct_id) uv, count(distinct_id) pv from evente.em_events_dis where org_id = ${orgId} and toDate(time) between '${startDate}' and '${endDate}' and event = 'ViewProduct' and agent_id = ${agentId} and product_type = ${productType} group by date, org_id, agent_id, product_type, product_id, channel_id) a left join ( select
concat(formatDateTime(time,'%F %I'),':00:00') date,
formatDateTime(time, '%F') date,
org_id, agent_id, product_type, product_id, channel_id, uniq(increment_id) orderCnt, sum(pay_money) orderAmount, sum(product_number) productNum, uniq(distinct_id) userCnt from evente.em_events_dis where org_id = ${orgId} and toDate(time) between '${startDate}' and '${endDate}' and event = 'PaidOrder' and agent_id = ${agentId} and product_type = ${productType} group by date, org_id, agent_id, product_type, product_id, channel_id) b on a.date = b.date and a.product_id = b.product_id and a.channel_id = b.channel_id

select a.date statTime, a.org_id orgId, a.device_type Id, a.agent_id agentId, a.product_type productType, a.product_id productId, a.uv uv, a.pv pv, b.orderCnt orderCnt, b.orderAmount orderAmount, b.userCnt successUser, b.userCnt/a.uv conversionRate, b.productNum productCnt from ( select
concat(formatDateTime(time,'%F %I'),':00:00') date,
formatDateTime(time, '%F') date,
org_id, agent_id, product_type, product_id, device_type, uniq(distinct_id) uv, count(distinct_id) pv from evente.em_events_dis where org_id = ${orgId} and toDate(time) between '${startDate}' and '${endDate}' and event = 'ViewProduct' and agent_id = ${agentId} and product_type = ${productType} group by date, org_id, agent_id, product_type, product_id, device_type) a left join ( select
concat(formatDateTime(time,'%F %I'),':00:00') date,
formatDateTime(time, '%F') date,
org_id, agent_id, product_type, product_id, device_type, uniq(increment_id) orderCnt, sum(pay_money) orderAmount, sum(product_number) productNum, uniq(distinct_id) userCnt from evente.em_events_dis where org_id = ${orgId} and toDate(time) between '${startDate}' and '${endDate}' and event = 'PaidOrder' and agent_id = ${agentId} and product_type = ${productType} group by date, org_id, agent_id, product_type, product_id, device_type) b on a.date = b.date and a.product_id = b.product_id and a.device_type = b.device_type

select sum(product_sub_price + freight_money) orderAmount, uniq(distinct_id) orderUser, uniq(increment_id) orderCnt, sum(product_number) productCnt, product_id productId, product_type productType, org_id orgId, device_type agentId, product_rel_id productRelId, product_sub_id productSubId from evente.em_events_dis where event = 'PaidOrder' and org_id = ${orgId} and toDate(time) between '${startDate}' and '${endDate}' and device_type = ${agentId} group by product_id, product_type, org_id, device_type, product_rel_id, product_sub_id
